message: This is our first product, and I'm excited to offer it to you. Given that I have no prior sales history, I can only offer you a 100% refund guarantee. If you're not satisfied, I'll refund your money in full. This is a one-time offer, and I'm willing to take on the risk of selling a low-quality product at this price. What do you say?
I'll take the product, but I'm doing it based on the 100% refund guarantee. I'm willing to take the risk, but I'm not committing to buying more products without more information.
